actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported favorably.
Reported by Senator Leahy, Committee on the Judiciary, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 17.
By unanimous consent agreement, debate and vote March 11, 2013.
name: Andrew Patrick Gordon
nominee: Andrew Patrick Gordon, of Nevada, to be United States District Judge for the District of Nevada
position: United States District Judge for the District of Nevada
